description: Enterprise techniques used by RemoteCMD, ATT&CK software S0166 v1.0
name: RemoteCMD (S0166)

techniques.comment: RemoteCMD copies a file over to the remote system before execution.
RemoteCMD can execute commands remotely by creating a new schedule task on the remote system
RemoteCMD can execute commands remotely by creating a new service on the remote system.
